activities: GoSpotCheck provides a software as a service platform that enables retailers and brands to collect market research and field data from physical locations, such as stores, distribution hubs, and other field locations.  The data collected includes field reports, quality assurance audits, and market research surveys and field surveys. Companies located in the EU subscribe to the GoSpotCheck platform and are granted access to a mobile application customized with the specific questions and data points that the customer wishes to collect.  Customer’s agents then use mobile devices, such as smartphones or tablets to collect the required information in real-time and in situ at the applicable field locations, which may be located in EU countries.  The information collected is transferred by the mobile application to GoSpotCheck’s servers located within the United States. The customer is then able to access the collected data via customer’s account on the GoSpotCheck platform and use the algorithms, decisioning tools, and dashboard provided by GoSpotCheck to analyze and sort the data and make real-time decisions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Registration information provided by customer for each field agent.  This may include first and last name, email address, device ID or telephone number, and GPS location.
